title: Replace header logo image with uploaded logo

requirements.text: Replace the Site Header logo image (the at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/a[1]/img[1]`) by updating the static asset used at `/assets/generated/pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png` so it uses the newly uploaded logo image (`download-1.webp`). Keep the existing image path so no other parts of the UI break.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png` is updated to visually match the uploaded `download-1.webp` logo and is web-optimized.
The header logo displayed by `frontend/src/components/site/SiteHeader.tsx` renders the updated logo without layout issues on mobile and desktop.
No other routes/components require changes to reference the header logo (path remains `/assets/generated/pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png`).

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose around them instead).
Keep all backend logic within the existing single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Changing the favicon/app icon or other site metadata imagery (unless it is required to accomplish the header-logo replacement).
Updating gallery images or hero banner imagery.
Changing business contact info or WhatsApp behavior.

edits: Replace the artwork with the uploaded circular blue emblem logo, centered on a clean wide canvas and optimized for web (pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png > pachavda-wordmark-logo.dim_800x300.png)
